title: Hacked and Region got changed
body: I get hacked, I got my account back I think, but I am unable to change my region back to my original region. I cannot go in my client to purchase a region change, and I have not yet heard back from riot, any way I can change my region outside of League's client?

replies.body: We definitely want to help out with this!  I took a look into this for you and see that your ticket was received, and has been escalated to our account team.  It may take a bit for a response, and it's important to to reply to your ticket as it could bump it back to the bottom.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as possible!
